lines.text: Maybe it was... a defensive measure!
Yeah, like- ''dang, this guy's got a gun, I don't want to get shot!''
No, I get that. But how's that supposed to protect 'im?
Uh... the concrete would block the bullet.
A guy shows up with a gun, so, to defend himself...
He pours a bag of concrete in the bathtub, dunks himself in, gets out, and waits for it to harden?
Into a shell to thin to stop a bullet?
